full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RNAM 'GREL GYI BSDUS DON THAR LAM BYI DE NYID GSAL BYED BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @103A *, ,BSTAN BCOS TSAD MA RNAM PAR 'GREL PA'I BSDUS DON DE NYID GSAL BYED CES BYA BA 'DI NI GRUB PA BRNYES PA'I SHING RTA CHEN PO SLOB DPON LHA DBANG BLO'I BZHED PA GTZO BOR BYAS NAS, RIGS PA SMRA BA DAR MA RIN CHEN GYIS, ,BROG RI BO CHE RNAM PAR RGYAL BA'I GLING DU SBYAR BA'O, ,YI GE PA NI SDOM BRTZON SDE SNOD 'DZIN PA RIN CHEN CHOS RGYAL LO, ,'DIS KYANG THUB PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE SGO THAMS CAD NAS PHYOGS THAMS CAD DI DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,AOm SVA STI, RGYAL BSTAN PAD TSAL PHAN BDE'I DRI BSUNG CAN, ,BSHAD SGRUB 'DAB RGYAS RNAM GROL SPRANG RTZI'I BCUD, ,'GRO KUN SPYOD PHYIR SKU 'BUM BYAMS PA GLING, ,CHOS SDE CHE NAS CHOS SBYIN CHAR 'DI SPEL, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm,, ,,)
